title: Fantastic Adventures - 124 Issues
description:
This magazine was begun by Palmer as a companion to Amazing Stories and
was large size to emulate the early Amazing this did not last long. It
published much light "frothy" fantasy in its early years, but by the late
1940's was printing much the same material as its companion, only more
fantastic in vein. At one stage in the very early 1940's it nearly ceased.
Some novels around 1950-1951 were of importance, but the story standard
dropped considerably in its last year. Its position as companion to Amazing
was taken by Fantastic.

This torrent contains 124 issues of the 129 published, along with two issues of the UK edition in cbr/cbz format. All scans are his-res scans made from paper copies. Please help seed this torrent.

The "Torrent" folder contains torrent files for the previously released parts of the SF collection. Read the "Read Me (Important).txt) file for more information about the scans and where to find them.

Filenames have been harmonized with Carlo's list (2014-05-18 version).
